reviews.text: Our friends recommended this Wolsey Lodge accommodation & we booked it as a group. We stayed in the house with the owners Robin & Sylvie and it was really wonderful and very, very different. Robin & Sylvie are very welcoming & entertaining...and slightly eccentric in the nicest possible way. Now, I'm a Bolton lass born & bred and Robin & Sylvie are...well very posh. Luckily they are both used to people from all walks of life so Sylvie didn't even bat an eyelid when the dye from my cheap, Peacocks jeans stained my legs & subsequently her pristine, white towels navy blue. Ahem....
reviews.title: Something very unique.....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Anyway, their house is very grand and the rooms are very comfortable. Nothing is too much trouble. Sylvie does the breakfast on the Aga & it's all very civilised. Their tales of how the other half live are intriguing to say the least. i was spellbound. (gobsmacked!)
reviews.title: A Wonderful Experience
